content.title: Community
content.description: We are created for relationship with God and with each other. When we come together in our neighbourhoods and invite others, something powerful happens. Ready to meet new friends and build relationships?

image1.alt: Two people talking at a kitchen counter, drinking tea.

content.text1: We believe that we are created for relationship with God and with each other. When we come together in our neighbourhoods and invite others, something powerful happens. Ready to meet new friends and build relationships?

“I wanted to spiritually find myself, but I didn't know how to do that. I pondered for a while about where I should go or what I could do. Is there such a thing as a church that isn't so uptight? Is there a place I could go to learn more?”

image1.alt: Woman standing in front of a building on a bright sunny day.

content.text1: When we're not practicing social distancing because of COVID-19, these are the ways we typically connect.

list.title: Sunday Morning
list.text: We gather on Sundays across multiple locations for teaching, music, prayer, and volunteering. We make space for spiritual seekers to come and ask questions, connect with community, and explore faith.
list.imageAlt: Three people standing by the doors of the Oakville building.

list.title: Sunday Livestream
list.text: We're live every Sunday at 10:00am EDT. A one hour livestream experience with stories, music, and teaching. If you're looking for a good first step, this is it. See you this Sunday!
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Jimmy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Home Church
list.text: In response to COVID-19 our home churches are now meeting online. During the week, we meet in small groups to study and apply Sunday's teaching, build relationships, and care for our neighbourhoods. We call this Home Church—and it's kind of the best thing we've got going.
list.imageAlt: Three people sitting around a dining room table eating snacks.

list.title: Kids & Youth
list.text: We work together to create a safe community where our kids and youth can learn to love and follow Jesus. We do this through building relationships, and equipping parents. Learn more about our programs.

image1.alt: A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Drop your email below and we'll make sure you stay updated about what's happening in our community and suggest some practical next steps.
